grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 好餌【コウジ】bait, decoy, lure, easy prey, easy victim, sucker
kun reading compounds: 餌【えさ】(animal) feed, fodder, pet food, bait, lure, enticement
撒き餌【まきえ】scattered animal feed, ground bait
餌【えさ】(animal) feed, fodder, pet food, bait, lure, enticement
練り餌【ねりえ】paste bird feed, paste fishing bait
